summary: Service Unavailability is a term used to describe an app that does not work properly. The app displays service temporarily unavailable. Service Unavailability can be reported by sending an email to: service.unavailability@mailonline.co.uk. For confidential support call the Samaritans on 08457 90 90 90 or visit a local Samaritans branch, see www.samaritans.org for details.

Bug reports about Login Error: Can't log in to my account says the number needs to be in 10 digits when typed with 94 but when i try with 0 it says invalid mobile no format. Can t log into the app even though my internet connection is available app is issuing error messages saying no internet.

Bug reports about Contact Change Issue: Can't update contact info. Can't change mail address or phone number. No way to contact support. Always displays inaccurate amount of gb amount. Can t even send a complaint can t update number can t even pay. One of the most useless apps ever used.

The app is so buggy and unresponsive half the time it says service temporarily unavailable. The app needs some serious attention and maintenance. It gets stuck frequently and crashes way too often. There are a lot of bugs and inconsistencies in the app that don't even deserve a single star.
